Featured Works

MSAC - Automation Audit Status

MSAC extension collects data from ORBC (Oracle Retail Branding Compliance) - an application system to manage manufacturer's compliance and as a result it provides some functions for reporting and audit purposes.

This project includes the following components:

  1. 1. The Extension - it synchronises data from ORBC, and conducts the rating calculation

  2. 2. The Addis - it is a web application that provides insights of the data

Lightspace - Safety Portal

Lightspace started as a Safety and Compliance system but it’s become much more. Not only does it reduce risk to your organisation, it drives efficiency and reduces overheads by eliminating paperwork and systemising manual processes.

I helped development team to build it’s core modules (Toolbox, Checklist, Issues Management, and Asset Register), change UI to be more clean, simple, and elegant, and add some new features.

YourLifeChoices Games

YourLifeChoices is Australia’s longest established and most trusted digital publication and website for the 50+ audience, helping Australians navigate midlife and the retirement landscape for more than 20 years.

Their websites has a fun & games section that provides several games for their readers. I helped the development team to restyling and enchance the game (logic, rules, and features)

BPJS Kesehatan - Activity Calendar

BPJS Kesehatan is a public agency that administers the Health Insurance program in Indonesia. they need an application that can record and remind the schedule of activities that employees have to do or visit.

I built this activity calendar application with some features:

  1. 1. Manage activity/event data with clean UI

  2. 2. Send reminder to employee using Telegram bot

Infinite Accounting - Overtime Approval Application

This application was built to help Infinite.id (Taxation and financial consuting company) to cut their previously manual overtime approval process.

They find it difficult to do overtime approval because:

  1. 1. employee overtime activities are not well documented

  2. 2. The manager must be in the office to sign an overtime application form that was made unexpectedly

  3. 3. he approval process is too long and time consuming because it has to be signed by multiple parties (supervisor, manager, HRD and director)
